an10.216:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you an exposition of the teaching on creepy creatures.
an10.216:1.2: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
an10.216:2.1: “What is the exposition of the teaching on creepy creatures?
an10.216:2.2: Sentient beings are the owners of their deeds and heir to their deeds. Deeds are their womb, their relative, and their refuge.
an10.216:2.3: They shall be the heir of whatever deeds they do, whether good or bad.
an10.216:3.1: Take a certain person who kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
an10.216:3.2: They’re creepy in body, speech, and mind.
an10.216:3.3: Doing crooked deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, their destiny and rebirth is crooked.
an10.216:4.1: Someone whose destiny and rebirth is crooked is reborn in one of two places, I say:
an10.216:4.2: in an exclusively painful hell, or among the species of creepy animals.
an10.216:4.3: And what are the species of creepy animals?
an10.216:4.4: Snakes, scorpions, centipedes, mongooses, cats, mice, owls, or whatever other species of animal that creep away when they see humans.
an10.216:4.5: This is how a being is born from a being.
an10.216:4.6: For your deeds determine your rebirth,
an10.216:4.7: and when you’re reborn contacts affect you.
an10.216:4.8: This is why I say that sentient beings are heirs to their deeds.

an10.216:7.1: Take a certain person who gives up killing living creatures. They renounce the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
an10.216:7.2: They’re not creepy in body, speech, and mind.
an10.216:7.3: Doing virtuous deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, their destiny and rebirth is virtuous.
an10.216:8.1: Someone whose destiny and rebirth is virtuous is reborn in one of two places, I say:
an10.216:8.2: in a heaven of perfect happiness, or in an eminent well-to-do family of aristocrats, brahmins, or householders—rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain.
an10.216:8.3: This is how a being is born from a being.

an10.216:8.5: and when you’re reborn contacts affect you.
an10.216:8.6: This is why I say that sentient beings are heirs to their deeds.
